mapper.select: SELECT signon.username, signon.password, account.email, account.role FROM account, signon WHERE account.userid = #{username} AND signon.username = account.userid
SELECT signon.username, signon.password, account.email, account.role FROM account, signon WHERE account.role = "kf" AND signon.username = account.userid
SELECT signon.username, signon.password, account.email, account.role FROM account, signon WHERE account.userid = #{param1} AND signon.password = #{param2} AND signon.username = account.userid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (userid, email, role) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE signon SET password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username}
